documents.name: Privacy policy
documents.text:
Home Terms of user Privacy policy Terms of user Privacy policy
    • In an effort to protect our clients' and site visitor’s privacy and rights, SafeVPN has established a Privacy Policy which explains what information we gather on visitors and what we do with information that we gather.
    • This Privacy Policy governs the manner in which SafeVPN collects, uses, maintains and discloses information collected from users of this Web site (each, a "User").
    • The handling of personal details like email addresses or payment data is always processed in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation. This declaration of data protection within this Privacy Policy is intended to inform the public how we process and collect personal information. Additionally, this privacy policy should inform users of the rights they are permitted.
  • 1.Information we collect
    • Payment information for processing payments.
    • Affiliates who opt to use the optional affiliate control panel will receive a temporary cookie.
    • Contact data submitted through live chat or support tickets.
    • Any e-mails we receive.
  • 2.How we Use Collected Information:
    • E-mail addresses are used to send information regarding subscriptions, payment confirmations, responses to customer inquiries, and SafeVPN promotional offers only.
    • Payment data is utilized to manage client signups, payments, and cancellations. No private payment data such as credit card numbers are stored.r.
    • Contact submissions and e-mails will only be used for correspondence during the course of business operations.
    • SafeVPN does not collect or log any data from its Virtual Private Network (VPN) or Proxy services.
    • SafeVPN users have the option to register with personal information. The personal information provided is collected solely for private use by SafeVPN as it relates to standard business operations. Upon registration for services at SafeVPN the account owner’s name, email address, and date/time is stored. This information is recorded to prevent fraud and abuse of SafeVPN services. SafeVPN users can modify or remove the personal information stored at any time. Upon request, SafeVPN will provide a user information on what account related data is stored. Registered users may request removal of all personal information at any time by contacting the support department or the official SafeVPN data controller.
  • 3.COPYRIGHT
    • The Service, its original content, features and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of SafeVPN and its licensors. The Service is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries.

documents.name: Terms of user
documents.text:
Home Terms of user Privacy policy Terms of user Privacy policy
    • This is where we break down what you're allowed, and not allowed to do with the apps and websites created by SafeVPN. The following text outlines the terms of use of the SafeVPN applications and website. You can also review our privacy policy, which outlines our practices towards handling any personal information that you may provide to us.
  • 1.ACCEPTANCE
    • By visiting SafeVPN's website or using the provided service (Including but not limited to all services and pages available on SafeVPN’s website) The Client fully agrees and understands the terms and conditions provided herein, SafeVPN’s Privacy Policy, DMCA (Digital Millennium Copyright Act) and all future modifications or amendments to this agreement. By entering our website and/or purchasing services, The Client agrees to be bound by these Terms and conditions. If for any reason The Client does not agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Policy and DMCA policy, then access to SafeVPN’s website and it's services is strictly prohibited.
  • 2.LICENSE
    • SafeVPN provides The Client with a limited, personal license intended for use only as set forth in this agreement for personal, non commercial, private and limited non transferable uses. Any and all intellectual property rights on SafeVPN are owned by SafeVPN and are protected by US International copyright, patent and relevant trademark laws protecting intellectual property and proprietary rights. You may not reproduce, copy, or download any content from SafeVPN without the express written authorization to first do so. Commercial use without prior consent is prohibited. The Client agrees not to alter, delete, obscure, or change any proprietary rights affiliated with SafeVPN content. Client rights are subject to these Terms of Services and New or future services may require an additional subscription or agreement. The Client fully understands and agrees that these terms are limited to VPN, Proxy and Email services.
  • 3.INFORMATION
    • In order to enroll you in our service and maintain your account we need to collect your email address after purchasing. We may also use your Apple ID for billing and customer support. From time to time we may use your Apple ID to request your feedback on our service, advise you of promotional offers regarding our current and new services and provide you with updates on our new products and product features.
    • We may also collect information such as your email and payment information in connection with your purchase of our products and services. This information is used to fulfill your purchase and to bill you as necessary based on your service plan.
    • The service our app provide is in compliance with relevant laws. Please be noted that torrent is not available when connected to VPN because torrents will result in bans of your IP.
  • 4.SERVICE SUSPENSION &. TERMINATION
    • You agree that TunnelBear, for any or no reason, and without penalty, may discontinue in whole or in part, cancel or suspend your use of the Service at any time, with or without notice.
